1.12.2.0.7.4: Updated mod to include up-to-date fingerprint.
1.12.2.0.7.3: Removed the need for the End Dimension, plus some internal cleanings.
1.12.2.0.7.2b: New Mythos-Based Flight Wand. Automated builds uploaded to CurseForge.
1.12.2.0.6.6: Updated mod deps, bug fix with long bow, teleportation wand fix, added texture for Lightning Staff.
1.12.2.0.6.5: Config options, crafting changes and additions to the guide book.
1.12.2.0.6.4: Fixed enchanted stick output only giving 2, rather than 8.
1.12.2.0.6.2: Added Shulker Helmet, more book entries and some bug fixes.
1.12.2.0.6.1: Updated Patchouli, disabled Patchouli progress bar, added custom Patchouli book texture.
1.12.2.0.6.0: Added a guidebook, thanks to Patchouli!
1.12.2.0.5.8: Config options for crystal effects and tool durability.
1.12.2.0.5.7: Replace chat messages with status messages. Drill now onyl attempts a disarm on players with armor.
1.12.2.0.5.5: Drill damage nerfed. Drill can disarm other player's armors.
1.12.2.0.5.4: Health charm is stackable up to 4. More advancements
1.12.2.0.5.3: Tweaked how the Human Effigy works, may be reverted.
1.12.2.0.5.2: Clean up, fixed longbow damage being stupidly high, added Mythos Arrows. Longbow requires Mythos Arrows.
1.12.2.0.5.1: Updated Forge, JEI and CTD Core
1.12.2.0.3.5: Longbow has less draw-time, Longbow does 3x damage, Longbow needs pulled for 4 seconds before firing
1.12.2.0.3.4: Cow Blood stacks to 64 items. Fixed Grim Shears death bug.
1.12.2.0.3.3: New shift-right click behavior on pedestal block. Pedestal will look active when in use. Misc bug fixes.
1.12.2.0.3.2: Updated to CTD Core 1.3.0. Added Stairs/Bricks for remaining Crystals.
1.12.2.0.3.1: Fixes Health Charm screwing up players health when they die.
1.12.2.0.3.0: Added IMC event for Multiblock Recipes, added new Pedestal block, to take place in the multiblock. Added 4x Ore to Multiblock.
1.12.2.0.2.1: Make Multiblock Validation output much more human readable.
1.12.2.0.2.0: Added new Multiblock Crafting Mechanic. Added Multiblock Validator Wand. Changed Human Effigy Recipe. Added Advancements.
1.12.2.0.1.5: Removed Crystallized Ender. Teleportation Wand does not need an offhand item. Amulet of Reaching now crafted with Crystallized Oath. Teleportation Wand now crafted with Crystallized Memory. Archeron Ingot recipe gives 8 Archeron Ingots. Replaced more textures.
1.12.2.0.1.3: Added Crystallized Blocks. Added Health Trinket. Added Amulet of Reaching. Requires Baubles.
1.12.2.0.1.2: Change Crystal Smelting recipes to be 1 in furnace, 3 in Enderfuge if mod is loaded. Created 'Ore Doubling Node'.
1.12.2.0.1.1: Add effect utilities class for later. Stricter checks on main/offhand crafting handler. Misc. styling fixes.
1.12.2.0.1.0: Re-balanced resistance times with flight items. Longer Longbow Draw time. Completed Crystallized Fire Stairs.
